<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">f123045bdad22110ab69a01767f4705d</macroponent><name>dropdown_2/items</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.imports
*/
function evaluateProperty({api}) {
var arr = [];

for(var i = 0; i<api.data.look_up_records_1.results.length; i++)
{
var myObj = {};
  myObj.id = api.data.look_up_records_2.results[i].sys_id.value;
myObj.label = api.data.look_up_records_2.results[i].video_name.value;

arr.push(myObj);

}
return arr;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>julius.balgos</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-25 15:32:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>7e0b4aab2d1221107f448125a5f54070</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dropdown_2/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Appathon App" source="x_snc_appathon_app">ba76ff4ba59221107f44741f381ec215</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Appathon App">ba76ff4ba59221107f44741f381ec215</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_7e0b4aab2d1221107f448125a5f54070</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>julius.balgos</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-25 15:32:52</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
